Key Match Events: Reed Sheppard played a career-high 20 minutes in the Houston Rockets' 127-100 demolition of the San Antonio Spurs.
Fans were treated to an extended matchup between Reed Sheppard and Stephon Castle
Pre-Game Insights: Houston Rockets coach Ime Udoka benched Reed Sheppard the entire third quarter despite entering the period with a 63-38 lead.
Udoka put him back in to start the fourth quarter while Houston still had a 94-71 advantage.
Post-Match Reflections: Reed Sheppard had three points and two assists in the final frame before he was replaced with Jack McVeigh with 2:05 remaining in the game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The next meeting between the two will be on Feb. 27 when the Rockets host the Spurs in Houston.
Reed Sheppard and Stephon Castle took on each other during most of their stints.
Others: Reed Sheppard stats against San Antonio Spurs on Nov. 6.
Reed Sheppard finished with five points, two rebounds and three steals.
